error.signature: error[E0277]: `X` cannot be sent between threads safely
error.regex: E0277.*cannot be sent between threads|Send.*is not satisfied

verdict.summary: Type doesn't implement Send trait. Can't use across threads. Common with Rc, RefCell.

dead_ends.why_fails: Implementing Send unsafely on types that aren't thread-safe causes UB

workarounds.action: Use Arc instead of Rc for shared ownership across threads
Use Mutex/RwLock instead of RefCell for interior mutability across threads
If using async, ensure futures are Send by avoiding non-Send types across .await

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'error[E0277]' is a concurrency_error error while 'thread '<unnamed>' panicked at 'a]scoped thread pa' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
